item.title: Trip hazard on man hole cover, 7th October
item.description:
The man hole cover is raised and a trip hazard anyway but the surrounding concrete is broken leading to me and others tripping on it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Congreve Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light at the end of cul-de-sac not working, 7th October
item.description:
The lamp post has been off for the past couple of weeks. It is the end of a dead end road and it is really dark in that corner. A runner just came out from that end of the road and completely frightened me as I did not see them there when I was putting rubbish out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushey Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Use of drugs and needles, 7th October
item.description:
There is more people using drugs and leaving needles on the floor. This is a public road..kids use this road to get to school near by.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Frederick Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: Dangerous Tree, 7th October
item.description:
Very large council-owned tree is overhanging the pavement. In the recent strong winds the tree dropped some large branches. Luckily they missed hitting anyone - or at least Iâ€™ve not heard of anyone being hit. Next time pedestrians might not be so lucky. Indeed, if the whole tree or trees come down they could cause serious harm as well as blocking Bridgen Rd/Parkhill Rd or River Shuttle or seriously damaging one of the houses on either side of the river.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Riverdale Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Upperset Primary school, 7th October
item.description:
7 weeks ago a person was seen parking up this car and running away from the vehicle into another vehicle. This person hasn't returned for the car. It is stopping some of the residents from parking their car and it is directly park upperset a school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Battery Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Outside Coronation Court (Kenilworth Rd near junction with Willesden Lane), 7th October
item.description:
Huge amount of dumped building/DIY waste - doors, sinks, cabinets and general rubbish. Pavement almost completely obstructed. Presumably not too difficult to identify who has dumped this as there are builders at the property during the day! Please, please, please take action!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
